name: df-denom
body: |- wceq(cdenom, cmpt(s0, cq, cfv(c2nd, crio(s1, cxp(cz, cn), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cgcd, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1))), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), co(cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), cdiv, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)))))))))
comment: The canonical denominator of a rational is the denominator of the rational's reduced fraction representation (no common factors, denominator positive). (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 13-Sep-2014.)
